description: This file defines a Qwik component for a flower generation page, using reactive state, scoped styles, and client-side tasks.

methods.name: component$
methods.description: Functional component wrapper from Qwik for reactive components.

methods.name: useVisibleTask$
methods.description: Sets up side effects that run when the component becomes visible.

methods.name: useStore
methods.description: Initializes a reactive store for component state.

methods.name: useStylesScoped$
methods.description: Loads scoped CSS styles into the component.
